import React from 'react'; import moment from 'moment'; import Moment from 'react-moment'; import { Image, CardDeck, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Herobanner from './hero-banner-2.jpg'; //import './App.css'; function Home() { const dateToFormat = '1976-04-19T12:59-0500'; var start = moment('2016-10-05 12:00:00').utc().startOf('month'); var end = moment('2016-10-05 12:00:00').utc().endOf('month'); var nrofWeeks = moment.duration(end - start).weeks() + 1; var startDate = moment([2020, 8 - 1]); // Clone the value before .endOf() var endDate = moment(startDate).endOf('month'); console.log('starting at', start.format()); console.log('ending at', end.format()); console.log('number of weeks', nrofWeeks); // just for demonstration: console.log(startDate.format("YYYY-DD-MM")); console.log(endDate.format("YYYY-DD-MM")); return (

Technical Experience

We are well-versed in a variety of operating systems, networks, and databases. We use this expertise to help our customers with a variety of small to mid-sized projects.

High ROI

Many companies find that constant maintenance eats into their budget for new technology. By outsourcing your IT management to us, you can focus on what you do best--running your business.

Satisfaction Guaranteed

That's why our goal is to provide an experience that is tailored to your company's needs. No matter the budget, we pride ourselves on providing professional customer service.
